languages.text: "Слушаюсь". {n}Вигдис подключает несколько проводов с затылка к главной вокс-системе мостика и опускает веки.{/n} "Похожий артефакт спасли вместе с вещами Леди-Навигатора с Эурак-V. Однако никто точно не знает его истинной ценности или назначения — все же изысканные вкусы Нобилите далеки от понимания простолюдинов".

traits.locale_text: "Слушаюсь". {n}Вигдис подключает несколько проводов с затылка к главной вокс-системе мостика и опускает веки.{/n} "Похожий артефакт спасли вместе с вещами Леди-Навигатора с Эурак-V. Однако никто точно не знает его истинной ценности или назначения — все же изысканные вкусы нобилите далеки от понимания простолюдинов".

languages.text: "Right away, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge's vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of similar description was retrieved from Eurac V alongside the Lady Navigator's personal effects. However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."
languages.original_text: "Слушаюсь". {n}Вигдис подключает несколько проводов с затылка к главной вокс-системе мостика и опускает веки.{/n} "Похожий артефакт спасли вместе с вещами Леди-Навигатора с Эурак-V. Однако никто точно не знает его истинной ценности или назначения — все же изысканные вкусы Нобилите далеки от понимания простолюдинов".

traits.locale_text: "Right away, Lord Captain." {n}The Vox Master connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of a similar description was retrieved from Eurac V along with Lady Navigator's personal effects. But no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are quite far removed from a commoner's understanding."

"Right away, Lord Captain." {n}The Vox Master connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of a similar description was retrieved from Eurac V along with Lady Navigator's personal effects. But no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are quite far removed from a commoner's understanding."

However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."

However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."

"Right away, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge's vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of similar description was retrieved from Eurac V alongside the Lady Navigator's personal effects. However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."

"Right away, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge's vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of similar description was retrieved from Eurac V alongside the Lady Navigator's personal effects. However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."

languages.text: « Tout de suite, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Vigdis branche quelques câbles depuis l'arrière de sa tête au système-vox de la passerelle principale, puis ferme les yeux.{/n} « Un objet répondant à cette description a été récupéré sur Eurac-V parmi les effets personnels de la dame navigatrice, mais personne n'en connaît l'utilité ou la valeur. Il faut dire que les goûts raffinés de la Navis Nobilite sont bien au-delà de la compréhension de monsieur Tout-le-Monde. »
languages.original_text: "Right away, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge's vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of similar description was retrieved from Eurac V alongside the Lady Navigator's personal effects. However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."

traits.locale_text: « Tout de suite, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Vigdis branche quelques câbles depuis l'arrière de sa tête au système-vox de la passerelle principale, puis ferme les yeux.{/n} « Un objet répondant à cette description a été récupéré sur Eurac-V parmi les effets personnels de la dame navigatrice, mais personne n'en connaît l'utilité ou la valeur. Il faut dire que les goûts raffinés de la Navis Nobilite sont bien au-delà de la compréhension de monsieur Tout-le-Monde. »

languages.text: “稍等片刻，舰长大人。”{n}维格迪斯从后脑勺扯出了几根电线，连接在舰桥的音阵系统上，随后闭上了眼睛。{/n}“在欧拉克五号星站曾发现过类似的造物，旁边还摆着导航者女士的私人物品。不过，没有人知道这件物品真正的价值或用途，毕竟导航宗族的精致品味与普通人的认知大不相同。”
languages.original_text: "Right away, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge's vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of similar description was retrieved from Eurac V alongside the Lady Navigator's personal effects. However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."

traits.locale_text: “稍等片刻，舰长大人。”{n}维格迪斯从后脑勺扯出了几根电线，连接在舰桥的音阵系统上，随后闭上了眼睛。{/n}“在欧拉克五号星曾发现过类似的造物，旁边还摆着导航者女士的私人物品。不过，没有人知道这件物品真正的价值或用途，毕竟导航宗族的精致品味与普通人的认知大不相同。”

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis verbindet ein paar Kabel von ihrem Hinterkopf mit dem Voxsystem der Brücke und schließt die Augen.{/n} "Ein Artefakt mit ähnlicher Beschreibung wurde zusammen mit den persönlichen Habseligkeiten der Lady Navigator von Eurac V geborgen. Allerdings kennt niemand seinen wahren Wert oder Zweck. Schließlich übersteigen die Geschmäcker der Navis Nobilite das Verständnis des Pöbels um ein Vielfaches."
languages.original_text: "Right away, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge's vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of similar description was retrieved from Eurac V alongside the Lady Navigator's personal effects. However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis verbindet ein paar Kabel von ihrem Hinterkopf mit dem Voxsystem der Brücke und schließt die Augen.{/n} "Ein Artefakt mit ähnlicher Beschreibung wurde zusammen mit den persönlichen Habseligkeiten der Lady Navigator von Eurac V geborgen. Allerdings kennt niemand seinen wahren Wert oder Zweck. Schließlich übersteigen die Geschmäcker der Navis Nobilite das Verständnis des Pöbels um ein Vielfaches."

languages.text: «De inmediato, Lord Capitán». {n}Vigdis conecta unos cuantos cables de la parte trasera de su cabeza al sistema de voco del puente principal y cierra los ojos.{/n} «Se recuperó un artefacto de similares características de Eurac V junto con los artículos personales de la Lady Navegante. Pero nadie sabe su verdadero valor o uso. Después de todo, el gusto refinado de la Navis Nobilite no es materia de conocimiento de la gente común».
languages.original_text: "Right away, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge's vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of similar description was retrieved from Eurac V alongside the Lady Navigator's personal effects. However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."

traits.locale_text: «De inmediato, Lord Capitán». {n}Vigdis conecta unos cuantos cables de la parte trasera de su cabeza al sistema de voco del puente principal y cierra los ojos.{/n} «Se recuperó un artefacto de similares características de Eurac V junto con los artículos personales de la Lady Navegante. Pero nadie sabe su verdadero valor o uso. Después de todo, el gusto refinado de la Navis Nobilite no es materia de conocimiento de la gente común».

languages.text: 「ただちに取りかかります、ロード・キャプテン」{n}ヴィグディスは頭の後ろからメインブリッジのヴォクスシステムにいくつかのワイヤーを接続し、目を閉じた。{/n}「似たような記述のアーティファクトは、ユーラック・Vから航宙士様の個人的な持ち物と一緒に回収されました。しかし、その真の価値や目的は誰も知りません。結局のところ、航宙貴族の洗練された趣味は一般市民の理解からは遠いものです」
languages.original_text: "Right away, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge's vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of similar description was retrieved from Eurac V alongside the Lady Navigator's personal effects. However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."

traits.locale_text: 「ただちに取りかかります、ロード・キャプテン」{n}ヴィグディスは頭の後ろからメインブリッジのヴォクスシステムにいくつかのワイヤーを接続し、目を閉じた。{/n}「似たような記述のアーティファクトは、ユーラック・Vから航宙士様の個人的な持ち物と一緒に回収されました。しかし、その真の価値や目的は誰も知りません。結局のところ、航宙貴族の洗練された趣味は一般市民の理解からは遠いものです」

languages.text: "Derhâl Lord Kaptan." {n}Vigdis, kafasının arkasındaki birkaç kabloyu ana köprünün voks sistemine bağlayıp gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Benzer şekilde tanımlanan bir eser, Eurac V'ten Leydi Rotacı'nın kişisel eşyalarının yanında getirilmiş ancak kimse gerçek değerini ya da amacını bilmiyor. Nihayetinde Navis Nobilite'nin rafine zevkleri, sıradan kimselerce anlaşılacak değil."
languages.original_text: "Right away, Lord Captain." {n}Vigdis connects a few wires from the back of her head to the main bridge's vox-system and closes her eyes.{/n} "An artefact of similar description was retrieved from Eurac V alongside the Lady Navigator's personal effects. However, no one knows its true value or purpose — after all, the refined tastes of the Navis Nobilite are far removed from a commoner's understanding."

traits.locale_text: "Derhâl Lord Kaptan." {n}Vigdis kafasının arkasındaki birkaç kabloyu ana köprünün voks sistemine bağlıyor ve gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Benzer şekilde tanımlanan bir eser, Eurac V'ten Leydi Rotacı'nın kişisel eşyalarının yanında getirildi ancak kimse gerçek değerini ya da amacını bilmiyor. Nihayetinde Navis Nobilite'nin rafine zevkleri, sıradan biri tarafından anlaşılamaz."
